name: Casino Golf
description:
Ever seen a dice and thought "I wish I could play golf with that."? 

Well, now you can.

In Casino Golf is a casino themed golf game that uses a dice instead of a golf ball.  When hitting a wall, the dice will roll and change weight and ease of control depending on whether it lands on an even number, or odd number.  

Made in 2 days for the GMTK 2022 Game Jam, where the theme was "Roll of the Dice".

Credits:

Game Design/Level Design: Luke Buckley

Art Design: Ulises Estrada

Sound Effects: FreeSound.org

Music: TrackTribe

GMTK Game Jam Logo: Mark Brown
